PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-01362015-02-05,  ,  ,  DESD, 
ActCanada Mortgage and Housing Corporation Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Employment and Social Development of LEONARD PETER SHARPE of Toronto, Ontario, to be a director of the Board of Directors of Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation, to hold office during pleasure, on a part-time basis, for a term of four years, in the place of Rennie Pieterman.
AttachmentsAttachment
